tourBios.curYrHigh: Played steady golf all week at the First Global Qualifying Tournament to earn fully exempt status for the season, finishing T3 with Maxwell McCardle and Niall Platt. Finished 1-over for the four rounds, shooting scores of 71-73-70-73.
tourBios.carHigh: 2014: Picked up one top-10 during his PGA Tour of Australasia season, opening with a 71 at the Queensland Open then recording three consecutive 72s to T10, six shots behind winner Andrew Dodtâ€¦Next-best finish came in December, when he T39 at the Nanshan New South Wales PGA Championship.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA Tour China Serie was T20th in 2015 at the Hainan Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 96th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the PGA Tour China Series.
